book_description: Those Days or Sei Somoy is a historical novel by Indian author Sunil Gangopadhyay. Originally written in Bengali, it was first serialized in the Desh magazine. The novel depicts 19th-century Bengal through the life of Nabinkumar, based on Kaliprasanna Singha, and features key historical figures of the era. In 1985, it won the Sahitya Akademi Award.
